channel.title: Comments on: Preparing for My Hong Kong Trip

item.title: By: Hong Kong Trip: Part 3 - Weiqi | BenGoZen
item.dc:creator: Hong Kong Trip: Part 3 - Weiqi | BenGoZen
item.description: […] I’m sure some of you remem­ber, I posted on red­dit and here before the trip to see if any­one was in the area. Most of the feed­back I got from peo­ple was […]
item.content:encoded: […] I’m sure some of you remem­ber, I posted on red­dit and here before the trip to see if any­one was in the area. Most of the feed­back I got from peo­ple was […]

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: Hey! I just sent you an email so let me know if you don't get it!
item.content:encoded: Hey! I just sent you an email so let me know if you don’t get it!

item.title: By: flippertie
item.dc:creator: flippertie
item.description: Ben! I am in HK and would be delighted to meet you. You can contact me at flippertie[at] gmail.com
item.content:encoded: Ben! I am in HK and would be delighted to meet you. You can contact me at flippertie[at] gmail.com

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: Thanks! I'll be sure to try and capture as much of the trip as humanly possible. And if you're thinking about trying to learn Chinese again, I'd recommend eChineseLearning. I've been with them a few months now and have found it worthwhile. Talk to you when I get back!
item.content:encoded: Thanks! I’ll be sure to try and capture as much of the trip as humanly possible. And if you’re thinking about trying to learn Chinese again, I’d recommend eChineseLearning. I’ve been with them a few months now and have found it worthwhile. Talk to you when I get back!

item.title: By: Friday Go Forward: Week 54 | BenGoZen
item.dc:creator: Friday Go Forward: Week 54 | BenGoZen
item.description: […] in case you missed it, I am going to be head­ing out to Hong Kong this week and will be pretty MIA for the next week. How­ever, I am happy to announce that none of […]
item.content:encoded: […] in case you missed it, I am going to be head­ing out to Hong Kong this week and will be pretty MIA for the next week. How­ever, I am happy to announce that none of […]

item.title: By: Todd Bowlby
item.dc:creator: Todd Bowlby
item.description: How'd I miss this post! Hope you have a great time, and I'm looking forward to both Go anecdotes and pictures of Hong Kong delicacies when you get back.:) Makes me want to take another run at learning Chinese, just to have an excuse for a trip to that part of the planet! Maybe someday.
item.content:encoded: How’d I miss this post! Hope you have a great time, and I’m looking forward to both Go anecdotes and pictures of Hong Kong delicacies when you get back.:) Makes me want to take another run at learning Chinese, just to have an excuse for a trip to that part of the planet! Maybe someday.

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: Glad to hear it! I will definitely make a trip out to the go association. I think I'll probably call them when I get to Hong Kong. Haha. And I do know Chinese! But I'm pretty sure they speak Cantonese, which makes my Chinese useless. xD
item.content:encoded: Glad to hear it! I will definitely make a trip out to the go association. I think I’ll probably call them when I get to Hong Kong. Haha. And I do know Chinese! But I’m pretty sure they speak Cantonese, which makes my Chinese useless. xD

item.title: By: My-ke
item.dc:creator: My-ke
item.description: Hong Kong is great! Hope you have a good time :). Definitely check out the go association, super nice people there, though you might want to contact them before since I don't think there is always someone there. (And I don't know if you know Chinese, but that will definitely help, haha.)
item.content:encoded: Hong Kong is great! Hope you have a good time :). Definitely check out the go association, super nice people there, though you might want to contact them before since I don’t think there is always someone there. (And I don’t know if you know Chinese, but that will definitely help, haha.)

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: Thanks! I'll be sure to check them out and hopefully be able to get a good story or two out of it!
item.content:encoded: Thanks! I’ll be sure to check them out and hopefully be able to get a good story or two out of it!
